Posts.Content: It’s early days, but you will get through it, I was diagnosed this week at the age of 28 years...safe to say my world completely changed one minute I’m fine, the next I want to hide...but find something that’s positive and focus on that...for me it’s my gorgeous family..they are my entire world...my everything.  If you ever want a chat please feel free to contact me.  Please make sure you accept any support possible, you aren’t alone in this. lots of love to you xxx
Posts.Title: Hello, I'm new here.

Posts.Content: You are still young,  It will take a while for it to seem real, my husband is still trying to get his head around it. He’s being incredible though.  But lots of support is so important and of course make sure you take time out for yourself and try and relax.  Xxx
Posts.Title: Hello, I'm new here.
